author: Gallaecio
message: Did you know about Necessitas? (Qt on Android) Not sure if it provides everything you need, but it does work.

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message:
I know about Necessitas but:
- Right now it does require the user to download Qt separately: first time you start an application, it sends you to Google Play to download it, which I don't like. They are working on addressing this though.
- I wanted to try something closer to native.
